availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, machinist. Native of Glasgow, Scotland. Married to Elizabeth Holbern. Father of William Holbern, Isabella Holbern, John Holbern, George Holbern, Robert Holbern, Mary Holbern, and James Holbern. Machinist in Jefferson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 2, p. 525.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 5, p. 504B.
Find A Grave, "John Holbourn (1828-1900)," Memorial #136437786, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/136437786 (accessed December 12, 2019).
